trans-unit.source: Provides access to the run-time transaction in a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 提供对工作流实例中运行时事务的访问。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeTransactionHandle"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeTransactionHandle"></xref> class using the specified root transaction.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeTransactionHandle"></xref>类使用指定的根事务。

trans-unit.source: The root transaction.
Gets or sets whether the workflow instance should be aborted if the transaction fails.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示是否应放弃工作流实例，如果事务失败。

trans-unit.source: If AbortInstanceOnTransactionFailure is `false`, transaction failure results in the exception that causes the failure to be propagated as normal.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AbortInstanceOnTransactionFailure `false`，事务失败将导致无法作为正常传播异常。

trans-unit.source: The default value for AbortInstanceOnTransactionFailure is `true`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance should be aborted if the transaction fails; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应中止工作流实例，如果事务失败;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Completes the current run-time transaction.
trans-unit.target: 完成当前的运行时事务。

trans-unit.source: The current execution environment.
Completes the current run-time transaction and schedules the bookmark callback when the transaction is complete.
trans-unit.target: 完成当前的运行时事务，并在事务完成时安排书签回调。

trans-unit.source: The current execution environment.
The bookmark callback to be invoked when the transaction completes.
trans-unit.target: 完成事务后调用的书签回调。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the current run-time transaction.
trans-unit.target: 返回对当前的运行时事务的引用。

trans-unit.source: The current execution environment.
The current transaction.
Returns a reference to the current run-time transaction.
trans-unit.target: 返回对当前的运行时事务的引用。

trans-unit.source: The current execution environment.
The current transaction.
Returns a reference to the current run-time transaction.
trans-unit.target: 返回对当前的运行时事务的引用。

trans-unit.source: The current execution environment.
The current run-time transaction.
To be added.
To be added.
Initiates the creation of a <xref href="System.Activities.NativeActivityTransactionContext"></xref> for use with a new transaction.
This method is used when the activity creates a new transaction for use by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是当活动创建一个新的事务供运行时使用。

trans-unit.source: The workflow could potentially persist one or more times before the callback is called.
trans-unit.target: 工作流可能会保留一个或多个时间之前调用回调。

trans-unit.source: This method allows transaction scopes in multiple branches of a parallel to queue up simultaneous requests without blocking each other from persisting at the completion of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许在多个分支的并行排队等候同时进行的请求，而不会阻止对方继续完成事务的事务范围。

trans-unit.source: To avoid errors if the workflow persists, make sure the state object can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免错误，如果工作流仍然存在，请确保可序列化状态对象。

trans-unit.source: The current execution environment.
The method to be called when the <xref href="System.Activities.NativeActivityTransactionContext"></xref> is created.
An optional user-provided state that contains information about the request.
trans-unit.target: 可选用户提供的状态，其中包含有关请求的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the creation of a <xref href="System.Activities.NativeActivityTransactionContext"></xref> for use with an existing transaction.
This method is used when the activity has a transaction that it requires the runtime to use.
trans-unit.target: 当活动具有它需要运行时使用的事务，使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The workflow cannot persist between a call to RequireTransactionContext and the subsequent callback.
trans-unit.target: 工作流不能对 RequireTransactionContext 的调用和后续回调之间持久保存。

trans-unit.source: Calling RequireTransactionContext again before the first call completes is not allowed and all calls after the first call result in exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 不允许在第一个调用完成之前再次调用 RequireTransactionContext 并在第一次调用之后的所有调用都导致异常。

trans-unit.source: This method allows transactions flowed in from the host to be provided to the runtime without risking an intermediate persistence point.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许从主机提供给运行时不会面临中间出现持久点的风险流入的事务。

trans-unit.source: The state object that can be serialized is not necessary because the instance is guaranteed not to persist when this method is used.
trans-unit.target: 因为实例保证不会继续保留使用此方法时，可以进行序列化的状态对象不需要。

trans-unit.source: The current execution environment.
The method to be called when the <xref href="System.Activities.NativeActivityTransactionContext"></xref> is created.
An optional user-provided state that contains information about the request.
trans-unit.target: 可选用户提供的状态，其中包含有关请求的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this run-time transaction is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否取消此运行时事务。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the run-time transaction is suppressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果取消运行时事务;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Activities.IExecutionProperty.CleanupWorkflowThread%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Activities.IExecutionProperty.SetupWorkflowThread%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Activities.IPropertyRegistrationCallback.Register*>.
For a description of this parameter, see <xref:System.Activities.IPropertyRegistrationCallback.Register*>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Activities.IPropertyRegistrationCallback.UnRegister*>.
For a description of this parameter, see <xref:System.Activities.IPropertyRegistrationCallback.UnRegister*>.
